locate_ancient_city.title: Find an Ancient City
locate_ancient_city.description: Ancinet Cities are underground cities found in the Deep Dark biome of the Overworld

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Fantastic, now make some noise to wake up the fallen.

defeat_the_warden.title: Defeat The Warden
defeat_the_warden.description: The ancient cities are home to the wrath of The Warden that is awaken by sounds.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Astonishing! Check the loot bag, you can get an arc from him that can turn you invisible! Remember, you could get a better one from the enemy

get_depth_key.title: Get a Depth Key
get_depth_key.description: For this you will need End Rods and what you have looted from the Warden

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Now See that massive rectangle? That`s the portal!

travel_to_depth.title: Travel to The Depth
travel_to_depth.description: Lit the portal with a Depth Key and jump inside.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome to the Depth. This realm is anything but friendly. You might need new gear to see better around.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great job! Now it`s time to loot around. What did we gathered?

get_agony_soul.title: Get an Agony Key
get_agony_soul.description: Sacrificial Bastions are big leveled bastions protected by Wardens. You can find the Agony Key there

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Perfect! Now use it on the Sacrificial Stone to revive the Agony Soul

defeat_agony_soul.title: Defeat The Agony Soul
defeat_agony_soul.description: The Agony Soul is a nimble yet deadly reincarnated Bambi, watch out for any surprise attacks.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good job! Use the lotted gear to become stronger!

get_tier_8_power_up.title: Get Yourself a Stronger Powerup 8
get_tier_8_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Apply those to your armor to become stronger!

83combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 83
83combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 83.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

locate_marble_forge.title: Find a Marble Forge
locate_marble_forge.description: Marble Forges are close to The Nether Fortress, only that these are made of marble and have an Arena inside.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good job! Now we can need to get the Weeping Soul to ressurect the Injured Marble Guard

get_sorrow_key.title: Get a Sorrow Key
get_sorrow_key.description: Sorrow Key is fond around the Marble Forge, look carefully around.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Perfect! Now use it on the Sorrow Stone to revive the Injured Marble Guardian

defeat_injured_marble_guardian.title: Defeat The Injured Marble Guardian
defeat_injured_marble_guardian.description: The Injured Marble Guardian is a marble made entity with strong powers. Don`t be cocky while facing it.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good job! Use the lotted gear to become stronger!

86combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 86
86combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 86.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

locate_deep_darkest_altar.title: Find The Deep Darkest Altar
locate_deep_darkest_altar.description: The Deep Darkest Altar is a massive castle arena that keeps at bay the remainings of the Deep Darkest Spawn

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good job! Now we can need to get the Deadblind Soul to ressurect the Deep Darkest Spawn.

get_depthabyss_key.title: Get an Abyss Key
get_depthabyss_key.description: Abyss Keys are found around the Depths Temple. Look out for it.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Perfect! Now use it on the Darkstone to revive the Deep Darkest Spawn

defeat_depp_darkest_spawn.title: Defeat The Deep Darkest Spawn
defeat_depp_darkest_spawn.description: All we know about the Deep Darkest Spawn is that it`s an abomination.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good job! Use the lotted gear to become stronger!

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great job! Now it`s time to loot around. What did we gathered?

90combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 90
90combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 90.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

travel_depth_to_overworld.title: Travel back to the Overworld
travel_depth_to_overworld.description: Get back home as we need to find the next adventure.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome back home, but adventure continues. There is one more obscure place to visit.
